item.title: Help making a gate Co owners and Owners
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

case ####: if(playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("You're the owner... Come on through!"); teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; actionTimer = 200; } else { sendMessage("You do not have sufficient privileges to enter this gate."); sendMessage("You have been teleported home..."); customCommand("home"); } break;

Read full topic
item.source: Help making a gate Co owners and Owners

item.title: Help making a gate Co owners and Owners
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

case ####: if(playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("You're The owner...Come on through"); teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; actionTimer = 200; } else { sendMessage("You do not have sufficient privileges to enter this gate."); sendMessage("You have been teleported to Lumbridge..."); teleportToX = 3222; teleportToY = 3218; actionTimer = 200; } break;

Change

to the gate id

XXXX to the x co-ord of where you want to go
YYYY to the y co-ord of where you want to go

Hope this helpedâ€¦

Read full topic
